member.name: ID2D1BitmapRenderTarget.GetBitmap
member.summary: Retrieves the bitmap for this render target. The returned bitmap can be used for drawing operations.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the bitmap for this render target. This bitmap can be used for drawing operations.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1BitmapRenderTarget
member.summary: Renders to an intermediate texture created by the method.
